net.kreatious.pianoleopard.midi.sequencer

Class InputModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kreatious.pianoleopard.midi.sequencer.InputModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, ParsedTrack

    public class InputModel
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable, ParsedTrack
    Model for the MIDI input keyboard, allows controllers to listen for events.
    Author:
    Jay-R Studer

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static InputModel create(OutputModel outputModel)
                         throws MidiUnavailableException
        Constructs a new InputModel with the specified initial state.

        After construction, the input model is not connected to any actual devices. It is expected that the consumer will change the input device.

        Parameters:
        outputModel - the output model to coordinate with
        Returns:
        a new instance of InputModel. The caller is responsible for releasing the resource.
        Throws:
        MidiUnavailableException - if the MIDI system is unavailable.

      • setInputDevice

        public void setInputDevice(MidiDevice input)
                    throws MidiUnavailableException
        Reconnects the input to a different MIDI input device.
        Parameters:
        input - the new input MIDI device to reconnect to
        Throws:
        MidiUnavailableException - if the MIDI system is unavailable.

      • addInputDeviceListener

        public void addInputDeviceListener(Consumer<? super MidiDevice.Info> listener)
        Adds a listener to notify when the input device has changed.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add

      • addInputListener

        public void addInputListener(Consumer<? super Event> listener)
        Adds a listener to notify when the user has pressed a key
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add

        public void close()

      • getNotePairs

        public Iterable<EventPair<NoteEvent>> getNotePairs(long low,
                                                   long high)
        Description copied from interface: ParsedTrack
        Gets the note event pairs overlapping with the specified interval
        Specified by:
        getNotePairs in interface ParsedTrack
        Parameters:
        low - the lower inclusive bound to return events for in microseconds
        high - the upper inclusive bound to return events for in microseconds
        Returns:
        a read only view of the portion of events overlapping the specified interval.
